greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number triangle binomial(n+2k,3k).
comment: Inverse array is A109956. Row sums are A052544.
formula: Sum_{k, 0<=k<=n} T(n,k)*x^k = A185963(n), A000012(n), A052544(n), A049086(n) for x = -1, 0, 1, 2 respectively. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 18 2012
program: (PARI) tabl(nn) = {my(m = matrix(nn, nn, n, k, if (n<k, 0, binomial(n+2*k-3, 3*k-3)))); for (n=1, nn, for (k=1, n, print1(m[n, k], ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 20 2015
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 06 2005
